song.title: In our darkness is risen a light
song.lyrics:
[C] In our darkness is risen a light, the new light of Christ has dawned. It will shine for all eyes to see, it will live in every heart.
[v1] Let the desert blossom once more, let it ring with songs of great joy; for the springs and the fountains bring new life to the barren land.
[v2] You shall see the glory of God, and the majesty of the Lord; Say to all the faint hearts, do not fear, our God has come to save.
[v3] He has come to bring us new life, let your hearts receive him in joy, For God loves us so much, he has come to ransom us from death.
